CustomField.description: D - Be business-like, get to the point. Abrupt fast talker. NO chat I - Friendly small talk. Show personal interest S - Informal human approach. Trust based. Relax your pace C - Detail oriented. Get to point but don’t speak too fast. Let them be the expert
CustomField.inlineHelpText: D-Be business-like, get to the point. Abrupt fast talker. NO chat I-Friendly small talk. Show personal interest S-Informal human approach. Trust based. Relax your pace C-Detail oriented. Get to point but don’t speak too fast. Let them be the expert
CustomField.label: Personal Preferences (DISC)
